tickets.subject: Cannot login to account
tickets.description: I've been trying to log into my account for the past 2 hours but keep getting an 'Invalid credentials' error. I'm sure my password is correct because I saved it in my password manager. This is urgent as I need to access my order history.

goldStandard.responseTemplate: I understand how frustrating login issues can be. I've checked your account and it appears there may be a technical issue. I'm escalating this to our technical team who will reset your credentials and send you a password reset link within the next hour. You'll receive an email at jane.doe@email.com with instructions.
